name: design.auditAccessibility
description: Run accessibility contrast audit for specified mode (light/dark). Evaluates WCAG AA compliance (4.5:1 normal, 3:1 large text). Returns pass/warn/fail status per token pair. Target SC-003: ≥98% pass rate. Completes in ≤5s for ≤300 pairs.

examples.name: Run focused audit for Button component
